Class SceneSwitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.Binder
      • com.roobo.core.scene.sceneSwitch.ISceneSwitcher.Stub
        • com.roobo.core.scene.sceneSwitch.SceneSwitch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.IBinder, android.os.IInterface, com.roobo.core.scene.sceneSwitch.ISceneSwitcher

    public class SceneSwitch
extends com.roobo.core.scene.sceneSwitch.ISceneSwitcher.Stub
    场景切换动画服务. 该服务是单例的，使用者只需要进行初始化，并设置动画切换展示器ITransitionPresenter
